FAQ
How do you enter a giveaway?
Here’s the great part there is NO PURCHASE NECESSARY to enter or win a giveaway. You can also enter as many times as is allowed. Simple click the “Enter” button and it is that easy.

User requirements
Our giveaways are only available to individuals that are legal residents of, and living in the United States, who are eighteen (18) years of age or older and can enter into a legally binding contract under applicable law.

How do I Win?
Well winning is the easy part. We randomly choose one (1) winner based on the entries within five (5) days after the end date/time of a giveaway. The prize winner is then notified based upon the login or information they provided as part of account creation. Email or electronic delivery notification will be used. All prize winners are subject to eligibility verification.

Limit on Entries
Entries are sometimes limited and are automatically updated daily. Each giveaway will provide you with a counter on the entry which will tell you how many times you may enter per day. Once the counter has fulfilled your entries for that day you will have to come back the next day to receive more entries.

Copyright Information
All pictures used within the application are free license photos.

Do I have to pay taxes on my winnings?
Any giveaway that exceeds $600 will be reported on a W-9 and 1099-Misc as required by state law. Those users who have a single win in excess of this amount will be required to provide a SSN in order to obtain their winnings. If you have any further questions about taxes you will need to refer to your accountant or tax professional.
Sweepstakes

Official Rules


1. NO PURCHASE NECESSARY
2. Eligibility: The Sweepstakes (“Sweepstakes”) is open to all natural persons who are legal residents of the 50 United States and District of Columbia, who are at least 18 years old at the time of entry. Void outside the USA, in Puerto Rico, the US Virgin Islands, and other United States territories and possessions. The Sweepstakes is subject to all applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations and is void where prohibited by law.
3. Sponsorship: Any giveaway which is officially sponsored will be noted prior to entry. Unless otherwise noted no giveaways are sponsored by a company, LLC, and or person.
4. Entry Period: Sweepstakes running times and dates of entry will be included above the entry button.
5. How to Enter: During the Entry Period visit the sweepstakes link located within the application. Follow the instructions given to complete any entry after clicking on the “Enter” button. You will be required to login to the system prior to being allowed any entry into the sweepstakes. Login can either be created, or you can use existing Google or Facebook logins. All prior agreements remain in effect depending on the platform for which you logged in for.
6. Limitations on Entries: Unless otherwise noted as part of the Sweepstakes there is no limitation on the number of entries.
7. Choosing Winners: Winners will be selected in a random drawing from among all eligible entries collected during the Entry Period within five (5) business days upon the Sweepstakes ending date. All winners will be contacted using the details provided prior to registration. No other contact information will be valid. If a prize is returned and could not be delivered then that prize will be void and forfeit.
8. Odds: The odds of winning will depend on the number of eligible entries received, according to the eligibility requirements of the Sweepstakes.
9. WARNING: ANY ATTEMPT BY ANY PERSON, WHETHER OR NOT AN ENTRANT, TO DELIBERATELY DAMAGE, DESTROY, TAMPER WITH OR VANDALIZE ANY SPONSOR-OWNED WEBSITE OR MOBILE APPLICATION OR RELATED SOCIAL NETWORKING SITE, THE ENTRY PROCESS, OR OTHERWISE INTERFERE WITH OR UNDERMINE THE LEGITIMATE OPERATION OF THE SWEEPSTAKES, MAY BE A VIOLATION OF CRIMINAL AND CIVIL LAWS AND SPONSOR RESERVES THE RIGHT TO SEEK DAMAGES AND DILIGENTLY PURSUE ALL REMEDIES AGAINST ANY SUCH PERSON TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW.
10. General Terms: By entering this Sweepstakes, you promise to abide by the Official Rules and decisions, which will be final and binding in all respects. YOU AGREE TO RELEASE, DISCHARGE, AND HOLD HARMLESS Kokoconnect.tv, ITS AFFILIATES, SUBSIDIARIES, EMPLOYEES, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AGENTS AND ASSIGNS FROM AND AGAINST ANY OR ALL CLAIMS, LOSSES, INJURIES, OR DAMAGES RESULTING FROM PARTICIPATION IN THE SWEEPSTAKES. Except where prohibited by law, by accepting prize, winner grants a perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free license to use winner’s name, photograph, voice, and/or likeness without further authorization, compensation, or remuneration of any kind for advertising, promotion and other publicity purposes in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world.
11. Winner’s Name: The name and/or login is available only within application after the close of the Sweepstakes.
